title: Www.typography.nu
content:
www.typography.nu has merged into   
   
 [http://www.retroglobe.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022124237/http:/www.retroglobe.com/)   
   
lots of old postcard stuff, retro stuff, and some typography stuff, including a type identification engine.   
   
bj
author: beejay
